variants.Description in input context: The variant leads to a frameshift mutation.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: frameshift mutation leading to truncated protein
Readout description.Result Description: western blot analysis showed reduced expression of OXPHOS proteins (HSPA9, NDUFS1, DLAT, and ATP5A1).

Biological replicates.Description: Repeated experiments were conducted for consistency.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in duplicate to ensure reproducibility.

Basic positive control.Description: The experiment included controls with normal cDNA to confirm specificity.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative controls were used to assess nonspecific binding or non-specific cleavage.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and independent t-test for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
